data.title: So many sandwiches hidden behind so much liquor
data.text: It's a corner liquor store and market, and it's a top notch deli with awesome sandwiches, bagels and other tasty morsels.  I had the Soprano and my wife had a tuna and swiss on sourdough.  Great sandwiches.  The subs are 10" and average just under $10 each.  Enough for two meals for some people.  Definitely one for a repeat visit.

data.title: Goodness -
data.text: Oh my, inside this liquor store is an amazing deli. My sandwich was amazing, and the guys building the sandwiches were awesome. Don't let the exterior, or interior, fool you. Yummmmmmm -

data.title: Delicious!! Best sandwich ever!!
data.text: Staying near the airport to catch a flight in the morning and just wanted to grab something quick and eat in the hotel. This place is located INSIDE the J&J market, but don't let its appearance scare you. These are overall the BEST deli sandwiches I have ever had, including in NYC. They have a zillion combinations or build your own. Either way, you will get a seriously thick sandwich, tons of meat, cheese, and toppings. I need to figure out how to lure these people back home with me.

data.title: Best sandwiches you will ever have!!
data.text: We found this deli on Yelp/Trip advisor and had to give it a try.  It was about 2 blocks from our hotel.  Actually passed by it as it is inside a liquor/convience store.  I have to say this was the best and biggest sandwich I have had in a long time.  I had the 38 special.  The deli owner takes pride in her sandwiches and I promise you won't be disappointed.

data.title: R U Kidding!?!?
data.text: A new delicatessan?!?! After years of watching them disappear...here comes a young couple that believe in quality, and flavor, and creativity. Oh! Did I mention customer service?!?! Oh! Did I mention delivery? Personal, professional, just darn helpful. And, help you will need with the extensive choices they offer us. You can order one of their specials, or make up your own.  And, they have any flavor shake you want too! Take a look at their website BIGBELLYDELIsf.com  Their convenient location next to SFO also makes this an excellent choice for an Airport to go sandwich...you all know it's feed yourself or go hungry on planes these days.
